meanings.definition: Spinach: a plant with dark green leaves that are commonly eaten as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: I added some fresh spinage to my salad for extra nutrients.
meanings.sent2: Spinage is a nutritious leafy green that can be enjoyed in salads or smoothies.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit snuck into the garden and devoured all the spinage!
meanings.sent4: Her love for spinage was so strong, it was like a secret superpower.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the spinage leaves brightened up the plate.

meanings.definition: Spinach: the leaves of the spinach plant, used as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: My grandma always cooks delicious meals with fresh spinage from her garden.
meanings.sent2: Spinage is a versatile ingredient that can be sautéed, steamed, or added to soups.
meanings.sent3: The picky eater refused to touch anything on his plate except the spinage.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, the spinage represented health and vitality.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of garlic and butter filled the kitchen as the spinage cooked on the stove.
